d1_flags: 1. goto C83C1E if TEMP_2 is set

d1_text:
Npc0956:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TALKED_TO_DYING_EVERDRED L_C83C5D]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_2 L_C83C1E]
ï¿½Don't cut in front of me![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you give me somethin', I'll let you have my spot.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Will you give me somethin'?[LINE_BREAK]

[LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C83B7B L_C83B5A]
; $C83B5A
L_C83B5A:
[START_LINE]
ï¿½Then stay right there where you're too short to see a thing![HALT][END]
